We are Looking for an experienced chef with expertise in Turkish cuisine.
It you have a passion for creating authentic and tasty dishes, this could be your next challenge!
Qualif

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Kitchen staff for turkish restaurant in Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are Looking for an experienced chef with expertise in Turkish cuisine.

It you have a passion for creating authentic and tasty dishes, this could be your next challenge!

Qualifications: • Experience with Turkish cuisine is required. • Specializing in grilled dishes, Turkish cold dishes and delicacies. • Ability to handle a busy kitchen environment.

Responsibilities: • Preparation and cooking of delicious Turkish dishes. • Maintaining high standards of quality and presentation. • Collaborate with the kitchen team to ensure efficient operations.

Qualities: • Creative and passionate about Turkish cooking. • Skilled in working under pressure and delivering results. • Team oriented with good communication skills.

We offer: • Opportunity to be part of a new and exciting gastronomic concept. • Competitive salary and good working conditions. • Opportunity for professional development and growth in the company.

Application: It you are ready to contribute your experience and passion to our new restaurant, send your application and CV to sb9am@hotmail.com We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Occupation.Name: Kok
AlternateNames: Kok med speciale i bagværk og kager
